com.hazelcast.config

Class YamlConfigLocator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hazelcast.config.AbstractConfigLocator
      • com.hazelcast.config.YamlConfigLocator

  • public class YamlConfigLocator
extends AbstractConfigLocator
    Support class for the YamlConfigBuilder that locates the YAML configuration:
    1. system property
    2. working directory
    3. classpath
    4. default

    • Property Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Type Property and Description
      boolean locateFromSystem
      Locates the configuration file in a system property.
